title: Pezroly
author: Pezroly
content: Fast ( ~ 2 minutes ) and without any fees TRON crypto transfers via TronLink wallet ( up to ~5 transfers with 1500 bandwidth for free everyday ). Google Chrome and Firefox TronLink wallet addons. Share also your experience with altcoin transfers without any fees.TronLink wallet link: https://www.tronlink.org/.Â  Hint: Give some merits in return.
